profile.ja:
分子の高振動励起状態の研究：ＣＨ伸縮振動の高い倍音のスペクトルを測定し、Local Mode Model が良い記述となることを示した。
分子線を用いた赤外吸収分光：赤外半導体レーザーを光源とし、ノズルビームを使った冷却分子の吸収分光を行なった。分子の振動や回転を極力抑えるスペクトルの測定により、大きな分子の赤外スペクトルの解析が容易になった。WF6などの複雑な分子の振動回転スペクトルの解析が可能になった。
レーザー多段階／多光子励起による原子のcomplex spectra の研究: 2台の色素レーザーとマイクロ波を使い、Ｙｂなどの原子の高励起リドベルグ状態の測定、解析を行なった。関連して発散しない原子波束の考察と実験を行っている（青山学院大との共同）。
また、比較的大きな分子の非線形分光を始めたが、結果はまだである。
profile.en:
Highly Excited Vibrational States : Fifth CH stretching vibrations of substituted benzenes were investigated and the results support a local mode model is much superior for the description.
Infrared Absorption Spectroscopy of Supersonic Molecular Jet: A supersonic free jet infrared spectrometer was constructed and applied to get the spectra of heavy molecules such as WF6.
Laser multi-step/multiphoton excitation spectroscopy: Highly excited Rydberg states of complex
atoms were investigated. Consideration and experiment related to the nondispersing wave packet are now in progress.
Nonlinear spectroscopy of relatively large molecules is now under investigation.

paper_title.ja: N-Body Simulations of Expanding Ions in a Time-of Flight Spectrometer
paper_title.en: N-Body Simulations of Expanding Ions in a Time-of Flight Spectrometer

description.en:
Coulomb expansion of an Ar+ and Xe+ ion mixture in a Time-of-Flight spectrometer was studied using N-body simulations.
We found that Ar+ ions form a shell structure around a Xe+
ball,a result which was not observed for the case of one ion species.

paper_title.ja: Molecular Dynamical Simulation of Ion Motion in a TOF Spectrometer
paper_title.en: Molecular Dynamical Simulation of Ion Motion in a TOF Spectrometer

publication_name.en: Spectra Asia, Spectroscopical Society of Japan

paper_title.ja: Molecular Dynamical Simulation of Space Charge Effect in a Time-of-Flight Spectrometry
paper_title.en: Molecular Dynamical Simulation of Space Charge Effect in a Time-of-Flight Spectrometry

description.ja: The behavior of ions generated in a time-of-flight (TOF) mass spectrometer has been studied using classical particle dynamics simulations. TOF spectra have been simulated in a condition of moderately high ion densities. The evolution of the distortion of the TOF signal has been revealed as the ions travel through the TOF tube. A bunching effect similar to e-beam in a storage ring was observed. The distortion of the signal was even more significant in the case of more than one ion species. The results will be useful to interpret TOF spectra with complex compositions. Keywords: ions, TOF spectra, space charge effect
description.en: The behavior of ions generated in a time-of-flight (TOF) mass spectrometer has been studied using classical particle dynamics simulations. TOF spectra have been simulated in a condition of moderately high ion densities. The evolution of the distortion of the TOF signal has been revealed as the ions travel through the TOF tube. A bunching effect similar to e-beam in a storage ring was observed. The distortion of the signal was even more significant in the case of more than one ion species. The results will be useful to interpret TOF spectra with complex compositions. Keywords: ions, TOF spectra, space charge effect

paper_title.ja: 強光子場下におけるクラスターのイオン化のシミュレーション
paper_title.en: Simulation of Ionizing Clusters by An Intense Optical Field.

description.ja: The ionization of argon clusters by an intense, femtosecond laser pulse has been studied using classical particle dynamics simulations. The time evolution of electrons and ions in a high power electro-magnetic field is described. These simulations show that it takes only a few tens of femtoseconds until many electrons leave from the clusters.
description.en: The ionization of argon clusters by an intense, femtosecond laser pulse has been studied using classical particle dynamics simulations. The time evolution of electrons and ions in a high power electro-magnetic field is described. These simulations show that it takes only a few tens of femtoseconds until many electrons leave from the clusters.

paper_title.en: OVERTONE AND HOT-BAND ASSIGNMENTS IN THE 2(NU-3, NU-6) LEVELS OF CHD3
paper_title.ja: Overtone and hot‐band assignments in the 2{ν3, ν6} levels of CHD3

description.en: Assignments have been carried out for the 2nu3/(nu3+nu6)/2nu6 (triad)<--ground state overtone bands and the triad<--nu3/nu6 hot-band system of CHD3. A vibrational extrapolation method, using correspondences between a spherical-tensor formalism and the more conventional description of symmetric-rotor spectra, was used to facilitate the assignment and analysis of these bands. The resulting assignments have been confirmed by time-resolved double-resonance measurements.

paper_title.en: OVERTONE SPECTRA OF CHD(3) WITH AN FT-IR SPECTROMETER AIDED BY INFRARED DOUBLE-RESONANCE

description.en: We have used a time-resolved double-resonance (pump-probe) method to assign the CHD, spectra taken by an FT-IR spectrometer at high resolution. The spectra of 2nu3, nu3 + nu6, and 2nu6 around 2000 cm-1 were investigated. Collisional processes in the molecule were investigated by the time evolution of the signal and double-resonance spectra.

presenters_text.en: MIZUGAI YOSHIHIRO, Takiguchi Nami, Takamine Aiko, Maeda Haruka

description.en:
As shown in the plots of final-state distribution of Li Rydberg atoms after an irradiation of a microwave pulse in the Figs of Ref. [1], the atoms subjected to an external oscillating field tend to be pulled into the 1/2 order subharmonic resonance state when initially in one of states in the vicinity of the subharmonicresonance.
Ref. [1]:M.W.Noel et.al.,Phys.Rev.A62,063401(2000).

presentation_title.en: Suppression of multiphoton ionization of Rydberg atoms by bichromatic microwave fields

presenters_text.en: MIZUGAI YOSHIHIRO, Kazuki Komatsu,A. Takamine, Y. Mizugaia, and H. Maeda

description.en: It is well known that microwave multiphoton ionization of H Rydberg atom can be described by classical mechanics in certain regime where microwave frequency is less than 1/n3 (in atomic units) [1]. Here n is the principal quantum number of the Rydberg atom. In that regime ionization occurs when the motion of Rydberg electron becomes classically chaotic. Because of this, microwave ionization of H Rydberg atom has served as a fascinating testing ground for investigation of quantum manifestation of chaos, i.e., quantum chaos for a long time [1].

presentation_title.ja: 発散しない波束の二電子系原子への励起の試み

presenters_text.ja: 水谷　由宏、瀧口菜美，高峰愛子，水谷由宏，前田はるか

event.ja: 日本物理学会２０１３年春季大会

description.ja:
近年初めてその生成が確認された発散しない波束は、その発現が非線形共鳴効果をに基づくと考えられるため、様々な多量子準位系へ一般的に励起し得ると予測される。
本研究では準位構造が複雑な二電子系原子であるストロンチウム(Sr)に発散しない波束の励起を初めて試みる実験を行い、得られた結果の報告を行う。

presentation_title.ja: 非線形波理論と流体・光学フリーク波モデル

event.ja: 日本船舶海洋工学会 平成22年春季講演会

description.ja: 海洋における巨大波浪の予知と回避：ログ波と呼ばれる海洋に突然現れる高波現象に対して、光の領域で割合様子が分かっている光ソリトンを使って振舞を説明した

research_project_title.ja: 学内共同研究 CD複合体を利用した、多光子過程の研究
海洋における巨大波浪の予知と回避：ログ波と呼ばれる海洋に突然現れる高波現象に対して、光の領域で割合様子が分かっている光ソリトンを使って振舞を説明した
